title: ASAP Rocky claims 'I'm a sex addict' and admits he had his first orgy aged 13
text:

Musician ASAP Rocky has revealed he's addicted to sex and admitted he had his first orgy when he was underage.

The 31-year-old rapper said he became addicted to sex at high school and experienced the orgy at just 13, TMZ reported .

ASAP claimed that threesomes are "normal to him" during an interview with Power 105.1 DJ Angie Martinez on her Untold Stories of Hip Hop show.

The Praise the Lord hitmaker said in a preview clip that he's always been a "horny kid", while Angie reminded him there's a different between being "horny" and being a "sex addict".

He then insisted he is a "sex addict", although it's unclear if the diagnosis came from a professional.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Pap Nation / Splash News)

The rapper has been open about his thirst for sex, as he once told Esquire that he needed a $100k bed "because I have a lot of orgies at my house with some very close female companions."

(Image: Getty Images for Prada)

In the interview, Angie asked him: "Are you capable of a monogamous relationship?" and he paused before replying: "Yes, of course!"

(Image: Haedrich/SIPA/REX/Shutterstock)

(Image: Splash News)

The star had no intention of shying away from his sex fetish, and spoke about it openly.

He told Angie: "These are things that people like to stay away from, that they don't like to admit.

(Image: Getty Images)

(Image: Christopher Peterson / SplashNews.com)

"I can't be embarrassed about it. I wear my heart on my sleeve. I won't do nothing that I'm not proud speaking of."

ASAP has previously dated Kardashian sister Kendall Jenner, and has also been linked to Rihanna , Rita Ora and Iggy Azalea.
description: American star ASAP Rocky revealed he's 'addicted to sex' and threesomes are 'normal to him'
